title: How do you play against Kat as adc?
body:
You literally can't position anywhere that's safe if all she has to do is pop next to someone, deal 2000 damage in 1 second to them, and you can't auto her because you're staying behind your tanks, then she resets E pops next to you, then you die instantly from 2000 damage in under a second, and even if you were lucky enough to land 1 auto, all it will do is like 200 damage to her, then she E's away safe and sound.

It's kind of like if Sonic the Hedgehog or Goku had a Machete, and you're stabbed through the heart at the speed of light, and your gray screen pops up as if you somehow switched eyes with a dog spontaneously.
